Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom.', '2. Turn on the lights in the bathroom.']

def locate_bathroom(bathroom: item):
    # Determine if the bathroom has been found
    symbol found_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside_char(char, room)
    return found_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        if not locate_bathroom(bathroom):
            # If the bathroom is not found, explore to locate it
            foreach room: item:
                if is_bathroom(room) and not visited(room):
                    observe(room, "Is this the bathroom")
        # Once located, achieve being inside it
        else:
            bind bathroom: item where:
                is_bathroom(bathroom) and inside_char(char, bathroom)
            achieve inside_char(char, bathroom)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Locate the bathroom.', '2. Turn on the lights in the bathroom.']

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom)
        achieve close_char(char, bathroom)

def has_switch_available(light:item):
    # Determine whether this light has a switch
    symbol has_switch=has_switch(light)
    return has_switch

behavior switch_on_light(light:item):
    body:
        if has_switch_available(light):
            achieve is_on(light)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind bathroom: item where:
            is_bathroom(bathroom) and inside_char(char, bathroom)
        # Select the bathroom item in which the character is located

        bind light: item where:
            is_light(light) and inside(light, bathroom)
        # Select the light inside the bathroom

        switch_on_light(light)
        # Turn on the light in the bathroom
